text: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ وَكُلّٞ كَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ
translation: 54.Ama korosuk Qaadaa kee taama firqawnaa kee kay maraay keenik duma warreeh sinni Rabbih astooti dirabboyse mari hık suge Qaadaa kee taamoomih inna, tokkel usun aben dambittê sabbatah ken finqisneeh firqawnaa kee kay mara Badat xuumusneeh bayisne, usun inkih sinni nafsi koroosannuu kee uma taamoomit yudlume marah sugen.
